response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship, we believe it is worth more than its face value. Considering its exceptional value, I am offering it to you for $15,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the significant investment in research, development, and quality assurance that went into creating this masterpiece. We are confident that you will find immense value in this product, and we look forward to the opportunity to serve you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. Thank you for considering our product.", "product_price": 15000}
